Roles, Rights Profiles, and Privileges
This section covers role-based access control (RBAC) and process rights management. RBAC components include roles, rights profiles, and authorizations. Process rights management is implemented through privileges. Privileges work with RBAC to provide a more secure administration alternative than administration of a system by a superuser. &prbac;&rbactask;&rbacref;&privtask;&privref;
